Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: Basically an interactive movie. The gameplay consists of some quick time events. That's it. Very similar to tell-tale games.Personally it wasn't that scary\, not like Outlast anyway. My wife tho\, she crapped herself\, but still loved watching me play\, and wanted me to start again right after finishing the game.So depends what your cup of tea is. For me it was a bit meh
